entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story, a wizard who has received letters from his godfather Sirius.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is Harry's godfather, a wizard who is innocent and in hiding.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is Harry's owl, who disapproves of the tropical birds that deliver Sirius' letters.

entities.name: privet drive
entities.description: Privet Drive is Harry's home address, where he receives letters from Sirius.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are dark creatures that survive in darkness and cold, but not in bright sunlight.

relationships.description: Sirius sends letters to Privet Drive, where they are received by Harry.
Dementors do not survive in bright sunlight.
